plot: A web series about actor Ted Frøysland, who, upon his return to Norway after studies abroad, learns that the film industry is all but ready for his unique talents.
plot_en: A web series about actor Ted Frøysland, who, upon his return to Norway after studies abroad, learns that the film industry is all but ready for his unique talents.
plot_es: A web series about actor Ted Frøysland, who, upon his return to Norway after studies abroad, learns that the film industry is all but ready for his unique talents.
title: The Shit
